Ужасний ИИ, мало оружия, анимации перезарядки оставляют желать лучшего. 
Играть надоест через час, а стелять из однотипного оружия - через полчаса!
После выхода второй части, первую уже вряд ли кто вспоминает из-за её серость-поносность-цветагамму.

Так-то игра идентична с второй частью, но здесь самого главного - онлайна нету, с тупыми ботами которые бегают за тобой и не умеют делать что-либо кроме стрельбы желания нету. Единственные причины играть в это - комментарии разработчиков о игре, а также потому-что занимает меньше места чем вторая.
challenging zombie shooter 10/10

- Juego Reembolsado -

Realmente ya había jugado este juego en el pasado, y eso sí, no le quito el mérito de que es un clásico, un juegazo. Sin embargo a pesar de que no tiene casi nada malo, a gustos propios te sugiero mejor que adquieras L4D2 ya que sencillamente en este el multijugador esta prácticamente muerto y la campaña del primero también se encuentra incluida en la segunda entrega. Si prefieres a pesar de todo adquirirlo por la nostalgia y por los logros, te lo recomiendo en absoluto. Espera a unas ofertas y ya. 

Puntuación General: 9/10
llevo mas de 10 años jugando. muy atrapante
muy bueno

The plot in Left 4 Dead is extremely primitive. According to all the canons of the genre, some kind of infection occurs, and literally in two weeks almost all of humanity turns into a zombie. The main characters of the game are four survivors who, with our participation, will have to continue their rescue.

Left 4 Dead borrows the very best from the Dead Man movies very effectively. Any connoisseur of the genre will immediately understand from whom the characters are "copied" and will appreciate the quality of their elaboration. The events of all four campaigns also unfold in an extremely classic setting - there is a forest, a sewer, a subway and a hospital.

The most interesting thing is that such a simple plot is more than enough for the game. Pre-programmed turns, beautifully staged and heartbreaking videos are simply not needed here - their work is completely taken over by the intricate gameplay.

At first glance, the gameplay looks very simple - there are us, and there are zombies that we kill. But here we will note one important detail that fundamentally changes everything that happens: in Left 4 Dead, the number of pre-programmed events is minimized. The AI ​​Director is responsible for what is happening here - a cunning algorithm that constantly monitors the player's actions and plans a new zombie attack so that it turns out to be as unexpected as possible and shocks us to our heels. What's important is that the artificial intelligence in Left 4 Dead is equipped with remarkable imagination and is really capable of making two runs on the same level completely different from each other. Moreover, each of them will bring its own emotions, will be with its own drama and will be remembered by us with something original.

Another strong point of Left 4 Dead is its excellent multiplayer modes. They are not the main game - you can get pleasure alone, with computer partners, but in order to feel the whole thrill, you still need to find living comrades. Firstly, when facing a zombie, natural behavior is very important - and even the most ingenious artificial intelligence cannot reproduce it. A partner sitting two blocks away can easily get confused, scared, make a mistake - and now Radiant AI with a cybernetic grin is already using this circumstance in order to generate another stunning scene of a zombie victory over a bunch of people. Secondly, in addition to cooperative passage, in Left 4 Dead there is also a real duel between two teams: a team of people and a team of the best representatives of the zombie rabble. That is, four unique bosses, each with its own way of playing and their special abilities. It looks very cool: people are rushing at full speed to the end of the level, but the team of ghouls, taking advantage of the opportunity to constantly know the location of their rivals, is already choosing the best place for an insidious ambush. Give it a try - lots of fun and new gaming experiences are guaranteed!

My boyfriend recommended this game to me and so far, 3 hours in, I really like it! Some parts are a little buggy and I'm still trying to remember all the controls but it's really good. Would recommend it.

You want to swim in the water? You want to swallow some pillz? Or you just want to bonk some people with ugly faces and yellow teeths that are yelling at you because they wanna beat you up for being normal after pillz? Well this game is great choose for you! 

    You can be a old man with a gun, biker with beard and some sentences about hating everything, a girl that yells like the old woman in the alley after being robbed and the inteligent human that is taking normal pillz always when feeling odd, but anyway...

     This game in short is delicious product for you. I recommend you to buy the second part of the game too, because in second one you got more content. 

      If you have microwave pc then play first game, if you have the ultra pro pc from NASA then play the second one and add as many mods as you can! Trust me i only crashed 30 times and i'm still downloading more.

      I will not be responsible for your actions and good luck!

5/5  Listen, I've said this many times so I'll say it once more:
"If Pixar ever spawned a Rated R / M work of genius, they would call it [LEFT 4 DEAD]!" Semi-Punny in title, the game deserves our respect . . .
I've heard some people tell me that Zombies get boring, but that's not entirely true now-is-it? The theme gets used a lot but obviously VALVE knew just what the Zombie Apocalypse World needed . . .'balance!' So, I've played Left 4 Dead off & on since Nov. 2008 when I was overwhelmingly satisfied while playing it upon it's release date. The characters grow on you, they keep it real but their dialogue is just too fun; it's really good! I'm still hearing the characters speak words that I've never heard them say even after all this time.  The A.I. is way better than most, I can't complain! You can have this experience & game casually or really get into it. I LOVE THE STORY, there's just enough of one in the background to keep the rest of the chaos comprehensive; but at the same time it doesn't exactly obligate you to dwell on the mild storyline either. Play the game mindlessly; (?) NO ONE CARES! You will get more satisfaction though 'if you really explore' the game's overall elements, it really doesn't take that long. You can jump in & jump out of the game quick or stay there for hours, the experience allows you to do so. There's enough scenarios to play through, that the game doesn't get old unless suddenly you discover that you have not life. That's the perfect time to take a break from Left 4 Dead & then refuel by playing Left 4 Dead 2; & yes you should own them both. I love [Left 4 Dead 1] the most, those characters are my favorite. 2009 [Left 4 Dead 2] does have good characters & a few advantages merging elements which we'll talk about later; but I can only ever praise [Left 4 Dead 1] every single time! That's what I'd say to the total of 'all 4 haters' on Planet Earth who pretend that this game "Isn't for them" .  .  .

At the end of the day/world 'I say' the game is more worthy of an [E] rating only because I do believe it really is 4 everyone!

Pros:
- Interactive Team work is easy & makes the gameplay even more fun; you'll literally make more friends than enemies. I promise!
- Action packed & with a variety of enemies that force you out of the 100% Comfort Zone & a few repetitive habits that would dull your own experience.
- You get satisfied as you play, there's enough weapons to fight of the Dead in epic way. Dawn of the Dead lovers welcome!
- Co-op gameplay is great but if you're new to the game, you gotta experience this on single player first. It's GOLD!

Cons: (If any)
- Burning out . . . (Which is why there's a Left 4 Dead 2) "Deal with it, you'll be back you lil'behtch!"
- Trolls, they exist in every game of co-op there is; so this isn't exactly much of a con. Laugh it off I guess!
- Things can go to Hell in a handbasket real fast so I only mention this to those who don't have thick skin, dust yourself off!
- Mods are 'whatever' but they might confuse people who are not already familiar with most of the game, so fair warning!
